message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $95 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to consider a price of $90 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  $90 is still a bit high for me.  I'm prepared to go up to $87.  Let's close the deal at this price.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. In order to move forward, I am willing to agree on a price of $88 for the product. This represents a reasonable compromise and I believe it will be satisfactory for both of us.
Alice, I'm close to my limit but I'm willing to go to $86.  This is a fair price for both of us and I hope we can finalize the deal.
Considering your offer, I am willing to agree on a price of $87 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a fair agreement.
Alice, I'm really pushing my budget here, but I'm willing to go to $85.  This is my final offer, let's close this deal!
